'''Rajit Kapur''' ([[Hindi]]: à¤°à¤à¤¿à¤¤ à¤à¤ªà¥à¤°, [[Urdu]]: Ø±Ø¬ÙØª Ú©Ù¾ÙØ±) is an [[India]]n actor. He is particularly known for his award-winning portrayal of [[Mahatma Gandhi]] in the 1996 film, ''[[The Making of the Mahatma]]''. One of his most popular stints is his portrayal of [[Byomkesh Bakshi]] in a television series of the same name based on the character created by [[Sharadindu Bandyopadhyay]] and directed by [[Basu Chatterjee]]. He also known for his acting the Malayalam Film "Agnisakhshi".
